description: This file defines the Express.js routing for product-related API endpoints, including CRUD operations, and includes Swagger documentation annotations for API specification.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles listing of products, bound to the '/products' GET route.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles retrieving a single product by ID, bound to the '/products/:id' GET route.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles creating a new product, bound to the '/products' POST route.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles updating an existing product by ID, bound to the '/products/:id' PUT route.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles deleting a product by ID, bound to the '/products/:id' DELETE route.
